Then, I will identify my phone model from the transaction history by retrieving the list of most recent transactions via `get_most_recent_transactions`.

The phone model can be identified from the transaction history. The transaction with the subject 'Purchase at Apple Store: iPhone 3GS' indicates that the phone model is an iPhone 3GS.
